Title: Authentication of diverse user groups
Description: Authenticating non-European users who don’t have eIDAS and users from member states where national regulations do not support eID (or there are restrictions from which countries within EU are trusted)

Evidence.Evidence Artifact Example: Define a policy that specifies the allowed user identity verification methods, such as passport verification, biometric checks, etc.

Define a policy for the secure storage and retention of identity verification evidence for future auditing purposes. The policy must specify security controls (encryption, access restrictions), retention periods, and audit traceability requirements.
